website_summaries.verdict: Beyerdynamic's Soul Byrd earphones deliver quality audio in an increasingly rare wired in-ear design.
pros: Strong audio performance with rich bass and detailed highs
cons: Not for those seeking booming bass

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!  Just tickety-boo, thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: After many tries with headphones of all types these are the best, for sound and comfort because you can sleep with them in! I also bought Comply tips thes make them more comfortable and almost noise cancelling reasons. In my opinion a great buy and recommend them highly. I am 78 and a genuine buyer and regular user!!😇
customer_reviews.author: florid065

customer_reviews.title: Good comfort, but somewhat lackluster quality
customer_reviews.text: My main earphones are the Panasonic RP-HJE125-K. Those have a great balance of bass and treble, but these beyerdynamic earphones sound off - they seem to favour the higher frequencies. I use my earphones for more than music. I also play video games and watch YouTube videos. I tried a range of different types of sound but the Panasonic earphones sounded better in every case. I did make sure to choose the right buds to fit my ears, and while that did help a little bit, it didn't solve my problem. I've yet to do more testing with these earphones, but my first impressions are not great.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Applin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Bought these expensive earphones, only to find that when used with a phone, the incoming caller hears a loud 'echo' of their speech of about 0.5 second, making conversation impossible. Poor for the price. Back they go.....
customer_reviews.author: Wah Wah

customer_reviews.title: Warm dark and bassy sound signature
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have very pleasant dark and bassy signature with relaxed and rolled off highs. For those who are used to bright or thin sounding headphones they might sound underwhelming. I personally like this kind of sound and prefer these over many more expensive earphones like Fiio FH5 or Final Heaven IV. In terms of sound flavor I would compare them to Sennheiser Momentum 2.0 Over-Ear Wired.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sound great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on a what hifi review, as they commended the sound quality and the ability to lay down wearing them due to the flat profile. I'm so glad I did as I often use earphones in bed. No more having just one ear in! The sound quality is really good. Detailed and balanced. I'm mostly listening with a Samsung galaxy note 8. The other thing I really like about these is that they don't fall out. Almost all other earphones I've used are constantly slipping out. The carry case is useful but maybe slightly big.
customer_reviews.author: M. Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Can't really fault them
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful, simple design, sturdy enough feeling cable and a lovely neutral sound, these soul byrds are a brilliant option in the £50-£100 price bracket. A few quibbles; they're still not comfy when lying on your side. Though some advertising claims that as they fit inside your ear and therefore solve the age old in-ear problem, they're better than many but still not amazing. Also, they're possibly a little pricey based on some competition. Namely the Soundmagic which are about half the pricey and honestly there's not much to choose between them. Overall though, these headphones feel like a quality product and I'm glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: ben dain-smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfy as well as good sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound like previous models but these stay in much better and much more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not worth full price.
customer_reviews.text: I have used beyerdynamic Byron earphones for a few years, which were fantastic value for money, however, these ones are not. Not only are they not as comfortable, The performance is lacking too. Maybe they need longer to break in but I returned mine just because of the lackluster performance and poor comfort.
customer_reviews.author: A Arora

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very special for the price. Clear concise, amazing detail. Bass response is great, doesn't add or take anything away you hear what your supposed to. Really will blow your mind for the price. Better than the Byron’s they replace. Give them time as the need to run in and don’t sound that special to start with, but persevere the really are great. Can’t recommend enough.... The best you can get for under £200 better than Sure 425’s and alike. Very special
customer_reviews.author: ian merchant

customer_reviews.title: Great little pair of earphones
customer_reviews.text: My main listen is the sony wh1000 xm3, which are far more expensive and high quality than these earphones. I bought these for situations where i dont want to bring a big bulky pair of headphones. And i was honestly surprised at the quality. The sony's are still the clear winners, but for a fraction of the price these lil guys sound great and feel great in my ears. I reccomend them to anyone who cares about sound
customer_reviews.author: manuel

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality - really irritating treble
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on the recommendation of HiFi magazine. They are utter rubbish. The bass is missing and the treble has so much sibilance that it ruins music. These are horrible. And I'm playing them through a Cyrus SoundKey which I know sounds very good indeed with on ear and over ear headphones. Will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Slartty

customer_reviews.title: Best earphones I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best earphones I've ever owned. I recently bought a pair of DT 990 Pro headphones from Beyerdynamic and loved them so I decided to purchase some earphones from them since the pair I had weren't very good. They're incredibly comfortable and never fall out of my ears, sound incredible and had very neat packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Rotherham

customer_reviews.title: Top value
customer_reviews.text: Same sound signature as Beyerdynamic's studio headphones but a bit too much base for my taste. I prefer to hear the drums instead of mashing them all into one. Can be EQd to sound decent for the value bracket. They come highly recommended by headphone reviewers online in the under £100 category. I tend to agree with them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Costache

customer_reviews.title: Sound good, but unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I am just sending back my 2nd pair, the microphone failed on both of them after a while. This is a shame as they are very good sounding earphones. I will not be buying Beydynamic again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Suthers

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones but you need to get foam tips
customer_reviews.text: After reading the What-Hi Fi review on these I decided to go for these headphones (their reviews have always come up trumps for me before). I own some Beyerdynamic Amiron headphones and they are superb so had no reason to doubt the brand. I was so dissapointed with the tinny sound and comfort which drove me to purchase some INAIRS foam tips (inexpensive). The improvements are outstanding - now the headphones feel much more comfortable and the sound is great. Good headphones but buy different tips. Beyerdynamic need to supply foam tips as standard as they are doing these great headphones a misjustice, but don't let this put you off as I am really pleased with them now
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth £50
customer_reviews.text: Whilst the sound quality is good, despite not being noise cancelling they still let in ALOT of background noise - far more than normal. Also, onto the second set as a replacement for the first as the first set came with a bend in the jack - the second set are straight but change volume when you squeeze the plastic on the jack at times so wondering if the design is just a bit faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Maz

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these if you use a Pixel 1 phone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these, since I wanted to upgrade my byrons. When I received them, I noticed the microphone did not work. I got in touch with beyerdynamic who said I should contact support. I contacted amazon instead who issued a replacement. I just received my replacement, and they do not work either. After some thought I tried them on an iPad Pro 1st gen and a Nexus 5X phone. Both of them the microphone works - but not on my Pixel 1 phone. I love beyerdynamic and their products but this is just nonsense. The sound works though...
customer_reviews.author: Antaeus

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: Can't fault these for the price. Reasonably balanced sound, quite full in the lows, impressive spectral field. Comfortable to wear and listen through. Worth noting that given the higher definition, these earbuds will make low quality audio sound really bad. But high quality audio sounds great. Would recommend for commuters looking for clarity and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: A very disappointing replacement for the previous model
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my Beyerdynamic Byron headphones which I had to return after one earbud stopped working. Unfortunately they've discontinued the Byrons, so I bought the newer model - these Byrd "premium" headphones. I'm so disappointed - they have none of the warm, rich sound that the Byrons had. The treble/higher end sound is so harsh and actually hurts my ears. So annoying when a company discontinues a line, then releases an inferior follow-up model.
customer_reviews.author: JJ2000

customer_reviews.title: I wanted them to be good
customer_reviews.text: Awful sound quality. Very tinny and buzzy. My cheaper ones are better than these. Was really hoping these would be as good as they hype but disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: rii

customer_reviews.title: Unusable for normal music listening
customer_reviews.text: The mode change button (3) appeared frozen/broken. Could not get decent sound at all unless the button was continuously pressed. Press and release did not work. Very disappointed as reviews had been good in the main. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: art w

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable (even when sleeping) but horrible microphone
customer_reviews.text: Earphones are qutie comfortable and I have worn them while sleeping in the past. However, the microphone is too low to use for any phone calls - you are required to physically hold the microphone piece to your mouth for the other person to hear you. Not what I was expecting for the price paid! The right earphone has now stopped working after 4 months!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liam Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Cable frayed after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: Overall I have found these to be a good pair of earphones my only gripe is the way the cable sticks out of the plug which makes it liable to being bent all over the place hence why the cable frayed at this place 10 months later, I have had other earphones where the plug is angled to the side so that if say your phone is resting on the plug the cable is not being bent 170° upright.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: They are so comfortable and lightweight you forget you're wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Andy P

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 1 day then one earpiece stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, no problem with fit which is unusual for me as I have very small openings in my ears, sounded really good. Left earpiece stopped working the second time I used them
customer_reviews.author: ds

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound, and the most important.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, great sound, though be careful, because, if you put it the headphones in your ears incorrectly, it might sound really bad.
customer_reviews.author: Almassy Pal

customer_reviews.title: the mic stopped working after less than 4 months
customer_reviews.text: buzzing noise on other end of phone calls then after a while the mic and sound controls stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top product!
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding pair of in-ears. Comfortable too, tho as I need larger foam inserts for my ear canal then I'll replace the supplied ones anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have had of these. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Ask

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sounds
customer_reviews.text: - great timing - excellent range - subtle but bold bass - clear highs - warm mids Simply the best earbuds I've ever used at this price bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Shone

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had the previous model and was very happy with 8,however these were a cheap version with poor sound quality and not worth having so I returned them!
customer_reviews.author: G. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: Very poor for the cost. Sound is incredibly quiet even on full volume. Bought much cheaper earphones that are much better quality. Will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound, poor power
customer_reviews.text: there're a good earphones but maximum volume is to low
customer_reviews.author: Manuel da Silva

customer_reviews.title: Mic issue.
customer_reviews.text: Sound and comfort are good, but Mic does not work with Moto G5plus. I've read magazine reviews saying the same. Presume it's a compatibility issue or maybe I have a bad pair. How to tell? Annoying! Will return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: MR CMcV

customer_reviews.title: Faulty mic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for apple EarPods. Sound quality is ok, ear fitting fair but mediocre given the cost. Worst of all the mic is faulty and stopped working just 3 weeks after purchase. Huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality headphones that fit comfortably and sound fantastic. Come in smart leather case as well which is very neat and will keep them protected when travelling.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Left earphone no longer working
customer_reviews.text: After eight months of regular use the left earphone has stopped working for no apparent reason, which isn't acceptable for a £50 pair of earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Wooooooow
customer_reviews.text: What a product, sound quality is incredible as well as comfort, I can lie down on my side and they don't cause any discomfort For the quality at this price, it's a winner
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Beck

customer_reviews.title: Sound far too bright.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with sound quality despite normally enjoying Beyer products. Sound far too bright. Product returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think they would be as clear as the iPod headphones I'd been using but I was SO wrong. Glad I dropped the iPod ones in the cat's milk
customer_reviews.author: Tag

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this earphone. Comfortable to wear and the sound quality is better than the original mobile headphone
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Good quality made headphones needs more bass
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made but I would have liked a little more bass response
customer_reviews.author: Tuba Jones

customer_reviews.title: Comfy earbuds with good sound
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt these are the comfiest earbuds I've ever used and the sound is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shame they didn't last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy.. good sound but it seemed to wain and just before it's 6 months anniversary they died on me..
customer_reviews.author: William Coker

product_meta.title: beyerdynamic Soul BYRD Wired Premium In-Ear Headphones in Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:WiredSoul BYRD is the perfect all-rounder. With its extra flat in-ear design, its ease of use and unbelievable sound spectrum, the Soul BYRD is your multidimensional companion for everyday of the week. With balanced sound and outstanding resolution, the Soul BYRD knows how to bring out the very best in your favourite songs. Take it anywhere at any time and have your music at your fingertips.. Ergonomically shaped housing ensures a secure and particularly snug fit in the ear. Thanks to the flat shape of the housing, the in-ear sits discretely in the ear and is therefore ideal when relaxing or sleeping without any discomfort.

BOX CONTAINS
One pair of earphones, case, ear tips in 5 sizes (XS, S, S, M, L, XL), cable clip, quick start guide
feature_bullets: In-ear headset with balanced sound and good resolution
Ergonomically shaped housings ensure a secure and comfortable fit in the ear

3-button remote control* with microphone for Android and iOS, Siri and Google Assistant controllable (*This is a universal 3-button remote control for Android and iOS. The volume up/down functionality depends on the playback device used)
Simple elegance, pleasant feel and impressive wearing comfort

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
